span.i: Due to the Coronavirus and the extended Stay-at-Home Executive Order enacted by Governor Holcomb, all Washington Township School buildings will remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. If you need technical assistance, please call (317) 254-5566 during support hours (M-F 9:00 a.m - 4:00 p.m.). If leaving a voicemail message, be sure to provide your name, student name(s), and your number to have a member of our support team contact you. If you have a curricular question, please contact your teacher(s).
